name: Deja Vu (CPOrt)
description:
Controls:

A/D - Move left/right

Space - Jump

J - Fireball

Mouse - select menu

Mnemo finds himself awoken at a forest. He has no reminiscence of why he's there, so he started to explore the forest. While adventuring, he discovers an extraordinary item called "memory" that seemed to trigger a dejavu or "familiar" events. He ventures the forest hoping to get more of these memories in order to find out what had happened.
